article_title: Recovery matters little to Ohio’s poor
article_text:
Total Access

Enjoy the convenience of home delivery plus Digital D. Sign up for our BEST VALUE today!

article_metadata.description: Lower unemployment has not helped Ohio’s poor escape poverty. The state poverty rate of 15.8 percent last year was down slightly from 16 percent in 2013, according to new estimates released on Thursday by the U.S. Census Bureau.
